import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispactch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { FormContainer } from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckOutSteps from '../components/CheckOutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions.js' function ShippingScreen({history}) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const dispatch = useDispactch() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress(address, city, postalCode, country)) history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
